DataConnection.Description: Connects to Microsoft Graph to retrieve emails from the email account specified in Get token connect rule
DataConnection.Name: Connect To Microsoft Graph

Source.Value: This component is designed to seamlessly integrate with Microsoft 365 email accounts, utilizing the Microsoft Graph API to access and retrieve the latest emails. By submitting a form, the component initiates a request to the API, which returns a JSON response containing the content of newly received emails. This process is facilitated through the REST Connect rule, "Get Emails from Microsoft Graph," ensuring that the application can efficiently process and analyze email content in real time. Please submit this form to view the content of latest emails.

Field.Description: This field holds the reference to a Email Intake instance.
Field.Name: Email Intake Reference
New Email Content From Graph API

Field.Description: This field holds the reference to a EmailContent instance.
Field.Name: EmailContent Reference

Query.Description: Query to List all EmailContent instance.
Query.Name: EmailContent list

Query.Description: Query to List all EmailIntake instance.
Query.Name: EmailIntake list

CaseType.Description: This case type uses Microsoft Graph API to access and interact with data in Microsoft 365, including Microsoft Outlook inboxes. Specifically, it allows developers to access the emails, calendar events, contacts, and other data from a user's Outlook mailbox within Microsoft 365 (formerly Office 365) and Exchange Online.
CaseType.Name: Email Intake
